title: 3v3 teams
body: I know this question is asked like 1000 times here but i couldnt find fresh info about it so im just gonna ask.So i have a 3v3 team which is gold.And i have a friend in this team who is silver solo q,and also he didnt participated in any of the 3v3 team games.My question is:at the end of the season is he going to get a gold border and the skin,or he should reach gold on solo Q ?

replies.body:
We haven't yet announced Ranked rewards for this season, but the advice and information *HYperion3182* provided is good to keep in mind as a frame of reference to how we've done it in the past. Keep in mind things may change this year, so keep your eyes on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for the official announcement.

[Here's](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2015-ranked-season-draws-close) our announcement from last year's Ranked Rewards if you wanted to see the full post on how we did it last year.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Assuming it's like every year, your friend should have participated in at least ten victories of the 3v3 team to be eligible to Team rewards. At the moment he won't get Team Gold rewards (only Silver SoloQ rewards), which is pretty normal, it would be too easy to join a Challenger team a couple of days before the end of the Season when absolutely not being that skilled. Keep an eye on official announcements in the following weeks.
